full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA NAM MKHA'I SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @027A *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL PA DANG, DGE SLONG DE DAG DANG, 'KHOR DE THAMS CAD DANG, LHA DANG, MI DANG, LHA MA YIN DANG, DRI ZAR BCAS PA'I 'JIG RTEN RNAMS DGA' STE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS BKA' STZAL PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'PHAGS PA NAM MKHA'I SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO RDZOGS SO,, ,,DAG ,GSUM ZHUS, ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
